html:
Today, B&H Photo has the Nanuk 923 Waterproof Laptop Case on sale for only $159.95, saving you $220!

Nanuk 923 Waterproof Laptop Case

  • Designed for 15.6″ Laptops
  • Removable Laptop Sleeve
  • Waterproof, IP67 Rated
  • Lid Organizer
  • Zippered and Mesh Pockets
  • Nylon Hook-and-Loop Straps
  • Included AirCell Shoulder Strap
  • Padlockable
  • TSA-Compliant PowerClaw Latches
  • Lid and Handle Stay

The black 923 15″ Laptop Case from Nanuk is designed to protect your system while providing it with additional security and the convenience you need to easily move it around. Crafted from NK-7 resin, it’s both durable and waterproof, keeping your valuables safe. Its top lid features and organizer with mesh pockets and a compartment that can hold a tablet. Inside is even more storage for accessories, as well as a laptop sleeve that you can use for added protection. If you don’t need heavy-duty protection, you can store your laptop in the sleeve and hook on the included AirCell shoulder strap for hands-free carrying. The 923 uses Nanuk’s PowerClaw latching system, which is TSA-compliant for frequent travelers.

Additional Features

  • Rubber feet
  • TSA-compliant PowerClaw latching system
  • Spring-loaded handle
  • Waterproof—IP67 rated
  • Padlockable
  • Shoulder strap attachment
  • Stackable
  • Integrated bezel system
  • Handle stay
  • Integrated lid stay
  • Stainless-steel hardware

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
